MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power fault affecting the LL11 postcode area of Wrexham affecting a number properties in The Meadows, Glascoed Way and the surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:43PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:33am on 1st April.
